Alumni_policy_key2: *The policy is subject to change as and when required by the management & agreements.*
Alumni_policy_key3: **Introduction:** This policy is created to define the guideline and roles and responsibility of the Alumni with the facilities which will be rendered by Nav Gurukul during the Alumni period.
Alumni_policy_key4: Life Cycle from Student to Alumni in Nav Gurukul:
Alumni_policy_key5: Students who join Nav Gurukul Campus and complete the prescribed course on a given period
Alumni_policy_key6: Once the course is successfully completed, students are placed for an interview by the Nav Gurukul team
Alumni_policy_key7: Based on the skill set of the student, he/she gets selected for the Job
Alumni_policy_key8: Once the student gets selected and onboarded on Job they are known as Alumni
Alumni_policy_key9: During the initial phase of Job **(Internship periods/ Training Period)**, Navgurukul extends their support by providing accommodation to the Alumni in the Campus
Alumni_policy_key10: Alumni have to follow certain guidelines which are mentioned below
Alumni_policy_key11: Guidelines and Roles and Responsibilities of Alumni:
Alumni_policy_key12: From the first date of joining the job until 45 days, Navgurukul will extend their support by providing **food, shared accommodation, wifi, and first aid** to the Alumni within the campus.
Alumni_policy_key13: Alumni stay can be extended only if the Alumni internship/training period is more than 45 days which can vary from 1 month to 6 months
Alumni_policy_key14: During this period (45 days), alumni are advised to look for another option to stay outside the campus premises.
Alumni_policy_key15: Alumni can rejoin the campus post the completion of one year residential course on below condition:
Alumni_policy_key16: For skill enhancement - specifically coding, programming languages.
Alumni_policy_key17: Alumni can rejoin interim while the period of internship is not over upto his/her internship period
Alumni_policy_key18: Incase if the Alumni willing to continue their stay in the campus after internship/training period he/she have to pay a monthly rent which will be **INR 4,500/-** per month which will include food, accommodation and other utilities
Alumni_policy_key19: In addition to being the alumnus/ae of Nav Gurukul, the alumni should also contribute to the culture and community of Navgurukul. The primary responsibility of the Alumni will be which is as follows:
Alumni_policy_key20: **Community Work**- Once in 15 days Cooking, Campus Cleaning, Shopping Vege`tab`le/ Groceries
Alumni_policy_key21: **Community Engagement**- Cultural Activity, Appreciation Circle, Townhall, Life mapping.
Alumni_policy_key22: **Student Engagement**- Mentoring students in their areas of expertise, guiding students on their career path, building the confidence of the student by sharing his/her personal work experience
Alumni_policy_key23: **Sponsorship**: A voluntary contribution towards the scholarship for the deserving student from the campus by Pay Forward plan
